attributes.action: Call a referendum to withdraw from the EU immediately
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Britain should leave the European Union immediately.
This would save the country billions of pounds a year, money better spent on 
Education, Transport and Healthcare.

Trade would still continue with EU countries.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
